title: True Ambition Is Recruiting High Diamonds and Above Players for OOL
body:
True Ambition is an international organisation for gaming. The main roster for TA LOL team is trialing new players, because of players having work/school and benching players for toxic behavior.

We are needing really high elo players and will know how to carry with the resources he has, Since TA Main Roster is only needing an ADC and TOP, we need them to be carry threats for our games, and your main objective on the team will be focusing and trying to carry the game. 

TRIALS WILL BE HELD DURING THE WEEK
SPECIFIC DATE AND TIME WILL BE TOLD IG

To apply comment below:
IGN:
RANK:
ROLE:
AVAILABILITY:

OR ADD ME IG : TA Vespik

Thanks for your time !!!
